topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c34e686368720e9c920000#post_54c34e686368720e9c920000
I'm doing a good thing for them, Which isn't self centered, But It's mostly for the sake of having more people be into the same things as me, Which I think is.

Basically, I'm worried about my image, But I can't figure out what people actually think due to autism and all, And to me it feels like everything I do is centered around my own personal gain or something.
